snippet.title: Neon Abyss 2 Gameplay Trailer - Future Games Show Spring Showcase 2025
snippet.description:
Boasting infinite item synergies and cybermythological trappings, a new gameplay trailer for Neon Abyss 2 burst onto the scene during this year's Spring Showcase. It's coming soon to PC, but you can check it out now via the single-player open playtest on Steam.

https://www.youtube.com/@FutureGamesShow

#FutureGamesShow #FGS #NeonAbyss2

Future Publishing uses the Epidemic Sound Library and Adobe Creative Cloud Generative AI features
